channel.title: Makin myself admin on a 508 server
channel.description:
Hi. i downloaded a few 508 servers. i edited them up a bit example :changed home added sum what of a quest and new trainin area with friends. I was wonderin how do i make myself admin :D
Thank you :)

item.title: Makin myself admin on a 508 server
item.dc:creator: @Prima Prima
item.description:
@Prima wrote:

In Login.java:

if (p.username.equals("yourNameHere")) { p.rights = 2; }

Replace ‘yourNameHere’ with your username that you login with.

Read full topic
item.source: Makin myself admin on a 508 server

item.title: Makin myself admin on a 508 server
item.dc:creator: @Master_Monk Master Monk
item.description:
@Master_Monk wrote:

src>io>mainsave>Your Username Open with Wordpad> Rights 2.

Read full topic
item.source: Makin myself admin on a 508 server

item.title: Makin myself admin on a 508 server
item.dc:creator: @Project_Territh Project Territh
item.description:
@Project_Territh wrote:

k first you go open the file. click on src and keep clicking until you see all these files CONTENT IO QUESTS and a lot more. click on players then right click player then edit then search for the name of the original owner then replace it with your name. any more questions?

Read full topic
